title: What are the techniques and principles of magnetism and hypnotherapy, and how can they be applied to various wellness concerns?
first_phrase: This text is the last part of a series of lectures covering various aspects of the use of hypnosis and magnetism. The technique of crossed breathing with the legs is explored as a possible solution to sexual problems. The Polyvagal theory is discussed as a possible reason for the effectiveness of this technique. The two-step therapy for dealing with burnout is explained, and the Trabona method is introduced as a way to balance a person. In addition, the fluidification technique and the Campanelli method are introduced as ways to prepare a client for magnetism. The text ends with techniques for stopping smoking and dealing with allergies through the use of hypnosis.

last_phrase: In conclusion, these techniques offer practical ways to address issues such as smoking addiction, allergies, and false identifications. The exercises involve a combination of touch, self-hypnosis, and clairvoyance to achieve desired results. Whether you are seeking to stop smoking, overcome allergies or simply de-identify with false personalities, these techniques can be used either alone or with the help of a trained hypnotherapist. With practice and patience, anyone can achieve balance and clarity using these methods. You can do it by yourself, or with the guidance of a hypnotherapist practitioner using the Campanelli Method for even better results.
